name: The Sims 2: Holiday Party Pack
storyline: Add home decor that matches the holidays - light up the candles, set up the garden gnome, and get the tree that tops all trees to show off your holiday feelings. Take Frosty on a ski jumping trip! Tuck in your young Sims with holiday-themed pajamas! Add a unique touch to your holiday festivities with international version of Santa, like Father Christmas and Cheongsam of the Chinese Fall Festival.
summary: Add some holiday joy to your Sims' lives with The Sims 2: Holiday Party Pack. Get into the holiday spirit and deck out your Sims' homes with 40 new objects and traditional décor items from around the globe. Indulge your Sims this season with this collection of 60 items of festive fun, from Germany to China!
